jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Overview
Driver Platform Product group is responsible for maintaining 4 core driver-partners that Gojek supply fleet uses which are GoRide, GoCar, GoKilat, and GoBluebird driver-partners as well as the backend systems that power the driver apps.

We are aiming to provide the best experience to driver-partners, improve the effectiveness and efficiency of our driver-partners communication, ensure that we protect our drivers and provide them peace of mind, ensure that driver-partners earn a sustainable income. This includes savings and/or potential revenue avenues.

Who Are We Looking For?
We are looking for a thoughtful and responsible engineer for the Driver Platform team who appreciates good engineering and user experience. The person should be passionate about maintaining clean and maintainable codebase. Lastly, someone who can empathize with our driver-partners for whom our app is the only way of livelihood.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Design and develop highly scalable, reliable and fault-tolerant systems
  • Able to translate business requirements into scalable technical solutions
  • Willingness to learn and experiment with new languages and technologies
  • Ability to plan, prioritize, estimate
  • Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across distributed teams in a global environment
  • Pair with team members on functional and nonfunctional requirements and spread design philosophy and goals across the team
  • Able to take responsibility for multiple services maintained by the team
  • Research new technologies and tools that enable building the next generation of Gojek services
  • Coordinate with cross-functional teams (Mobile, DevOps, Data, UX, QA, etc.) on planning and execution
  • Build and manage automated build/test/deployment environments

• Hands-on experience in designing, developing, testing and deploying large scale applications in any language or stack
  • Well versed with Agile methodologies, TDD, Test Engineering and Automation
  • Good understanding of different programming paradigms
  • Proficient in OOP, SQL, Design Patterns
  • Experience with functional programming is a plus
  • Data modeling experience in both Relational and NoSQL databases. We primarily use Clojure, Golang, Ruby, and Java. Familiarity with one or more is a plus
  • Ability to design and implement low latency RESTful services
  • Ability to understand and implement Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery
  • Experience in troubleshooting server performance memory issues, GC tuning, resource leaks, etc
  • Good understanding of microservice architecture, event-driven systems is a definite plus
  • Deep knowledge of Linux as a production environment
  • Kubernetes is a plus
  • Awareness that every downtime could hurt driver-partners
  • A strong sense of ownership
  • You shall write code because you like to
  • You never stop wanting to get better at it
  • Passion for learning new things, solving challenging problems
